RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STEAL IT BACK tracked along the inside, shifted outside of the top pair at the three sixteenths pole, rallied in the final furlong to bear down on them in the closing stages, and gained an advantage in the shadow of the wire. INTHEALY set a clear pace while in hand around the turn, held sway from a chasing rival through midstretch, but began to tire entering the final sixteenth, met a pair of bids in the closing stages, and was caught nearing the wire before holding place. ARCTIC ROSE stalked three to two wide, took dead aim on the pace setter in upper stretch, but failed to progress until the final sixteenth, attempted a bid soon after while an outer oncharging STEAL IT BACK menaced, and was outkicked late before failing to reach place. HEREWECOMETOGETYOU saved ground off of the pace, shifted out in upper stretch, angled further out to remain outside of leading foes approaching midstretch, then lacked a kick. ARGYBARGY BUCK tracked two to three wide, came into the lane in the five path, herded a few paths further out coming to midstretch, and faded. DATSWHATILIKE broke a step slowly, and got outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Steal It Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, shifted out 3/16, rallied, late bid, up

ENTRY.NAME: Datswhatilike
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Inthealy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set clear pace, held sway 1/8, dug in late, caught/held place

ENTRY.NAME: Argybargy Buck
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2wd, 3wd 3/8, 5p1/4, herded out upr, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Arctic Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3-2w,took aim upr,chased,bid 1/16,outkickd,hung for place

ENTRY.NAME: Herewecometogetyou
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, shifted out upr, herded, lacked kicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 22000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2021 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since November 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY AVE dueled for the lead inside of a vying rival around the turn, shook free at the quarter pole, and drew off under driving pressure. OURPERFECTPRINCESS vied for the lead two wide, sparred around the turn, but proved no match for her inner counterpart at the quarter pole, and held place thereafter. GALAXY THIRTYSIX trailed along the inside around the turn, came into the lane in the four path then improved between horses while shifting ground outwardly in the final sixteenth. SERIOUSLY SASSY stalked along the inside, but lacked a bid. ZYDECO MUSIC bobbled at the start while last away, lacked speed four wide, inched closer turning for home before fanning to the six path entering the lane, and flattened out in the final furlong without menacing. FORBIDDEN FRUIT stalked three wide, spun into the lane in the five path, and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Galaxy Thirtysix
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed inside, 4p upr, improved btwn late

ENTRY.NAME: Seriously Sassy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Ave
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside foe, dueled turn, shook clear 1/4, drew off, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Ourperfectprincess
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2wd, dueled turn, outpaced 1/4, no match, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Zydeco Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, off pace 4wd, inched closer 5/16, 6p1/4, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Forbidden Fruit
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd, 5p1/4, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STEALING APRIORITY set the pace three to two wide into the turn, drew clear of rivals entering the lane, and held sway. HEARTTHROB HALO broke in and bumped a foe at the start, tracked two wide, took the turn in the three path, gained place from wide foe at the three sixteenths pole, and chased the clear leader home to prove second best. WAR TROLLEY bumped with an inner rival soon after the start, trailed the field in the two path, came into the lane in the four path, rallied between horses in midstretch, and claimed show from an outer rival in the final sixteenth. HALF A DOODLE bumped an inner rival before being jostled between horses by an outer foe at the start, lacked speed along the inside, swung to the seven path entering the lane, stayed on between horses to reach show at the sixteenth pole, but was outfinished by an inner rival late. ROCK STAR ALEX bumped with rivals on both sides at the start, laid off of the pace in the four path, fanned to the nine path entering the lane, and stayed on mildly. CHIEFWEAVE stalked four to three wide, ranged up in the four path to attempt a bid turning for home, but drifted to the six path while yielding at the quarter pole, and faltered between rivals in the final furlong. BERNIE SPECIAL bumped with an outer rival in the opening stages, vied two wide and between horses, tucked after clearing an inner rival entering the turn, but gave way approaching the five sixteenths pole, and weakened. GEM OF CARLOS bumped an outer rival at the start, raced close up along the inside while under firm restraint, failed to secure inside vying position nearing the turn, chased around the bend, and weakened turning for home.

ENTRY.NAME: Gem of Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, close up inside, firm hold, chased turn, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Rock Star Alex
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped btwn start, off pace 4p, 9p1/4, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Half a Doodle
ENTRY.OWNER: Jones Laurence and Evans Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumpd btw st,off pace ins,7p1/4,stayd on btw,up show1/16,outfnshd

ENTRY.NAME: Heartthrob Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in/bumped foe start,tracked 2w-3p,up place 3/16,2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bernie Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump after start, speed 2wd btwn, ins 7/16, gave way 5/16, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: War Trolley
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump after start, trailed 2p, 4p1/4, rallied btwn, up show late

ENTRY.NAME: Chiefweave
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4-3wd, 4p turn, bid 5/16, yielded 6p1/4, faltered btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Stealing Apriority
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3-2wd, drew off 1/4, held sway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLANTS AND BIRDS acted up in the starting gates, saved ground off of the pace, gained in the four path turning for home, bid outside of the top pair leaving the furlong pole, and drove clear. AVENDORE stalked the top pair from the two path, gained place into the far turn before chasing the clear leader around that bend, sustained a rail bid in midstretch, but was outkicked inside the final furlong, and secured place in the late stages. JACKIE FLASH broke out, vied for the lead outside of the pace setter, inherited the fore approaching the far turn, inched clear around that bend, but met challenges from rivals on either side in midstretch, and yielded in the final furlong. MISS TONALIST broke a step slowly, trailed, moved out of last in the four path around the far turn, then failed to threaten the top trio thereafter. LA CHAPEAU set the pace inside of a vying rival, got headed with seven sixteenths to go, and weakened around the far turn. JIG TIME BANDIT tracked in the four path, but was through after a half mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Plants and Birds
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate,off pace ins,gained 4p2nd,bid 3w1/8,drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: La Chapeau
ENTRY.OWNER: Vanier, Nancy A. and Williamson, Lyda
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside foe, headed 7/16, wknd 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Avendore
ENTRY.OWNER: Durlacher Mary Durlacher James and Endeavor Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pair 2p, chased 2nd, rail bid 1/8, outkickd, securd place

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,vied 2wd-3path,led 7/16,clear 2nd,dug in btw1/8,yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Tonalist
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, trailed, 4p2nd, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Jig Time Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4p, through after 1/2

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Louisiana Bred NW2 $5000 & NW3 $5000 Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STOCKPILER settled far back along the inside, tracked from behind rivals while in the three path around the far turn, split foes in the five path at the three sixteenths pole while commencing a rally, yet shifted ground inwardly while picking up stride in midstretch, dove to the rail leaving the furlong grounds to produce a bid inside of the leaders at the sixteenth pole, and drove clear. RONITHELIMODRIVER tracked four wide, bid for the lead three wide around the far turn, vied through midstretch, but was outkicked by an inner rival at the sixteenth pole before gaining place. COSTELLO'S KITTEN stalked in the two path, then two wide and between horses down the backstretch, sustained a bid along with an outer rival turning for home, clung to an advantage through midstretch while hanging on his left lead, but was outkicked by a rail bidder at the sixteenth pole, and yielded. MASQUERADE BALL pulled clear, but was headed by a pair of bidders at the five sixteenths pole, and weakened. MOSH PIT tracked along the inside, chased around the far turn, shifted out to the four path in upper stretch, but lacked a bid. EXCLAIM rated at the rear two wide, improved in the four path and between horses entering the far turn, but stalled out entering the lane in the six path, and yielded. KEYS INCLUDED tracked three wide and between horses, but faltered entering the far turn. OGRE'S LION KING laid off of the pace while hung in the five path around both turns, came into the lane in the seven path, and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Mosh Pit
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, chased 2nd, 4p upr, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Exclaim
ENTRY.COMMENT: at rear 2wd, improved 4p btw 7/16, 6p1/4, yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Keys Included
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3wd btwn, faltered btwn 7/16

ENTRY.NAME: Costello's Kitten
ENTRY.OWNER: E and J Livestock Farms, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalkd 2p,2w btw11/16,bid btw5/16,led,left lead,outkckd1/16,yield

ENTRY.NAME: Stockpiler
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back ins,3p2nd,split 5p3/16,rallied,dove in,rail bid1/16,clrd

ENTRY.NAME: Masquerade Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled clear, headed ins pair 5/16, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Ronithelimodriver
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4wd, bid 3w5/16, vied, outkicked 1/16, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Ogre's Lion King
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 5p turns, 7p1/4, wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 25000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000, if for $25,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BEEMSTER tracked along the inside, shifted three wide and between horses entering the lane, rallied in pursuit of the clear leader in the final furlong, surged alongside that one while drifting outwardly nearing the wire, and narrowly prevailed. GALLANT BUCK dueled for the lead along the inside, drew off entering the lane, maintained a wide margin into the final sixteenth, but was caught at the wire. BACK BEAT stalked three wide, chased under strong coaxing around the turn, got floated four wide entering the lane, delayed his lead change until reaching the furlong grounds, and ran on. SPECIAL OPERATOR saved ground while trailing, produced a rail rally to attempt a place bid leaving the furlong pole, but flattened out. BELLO CREEDO dueled for the lead two wide, but yielded entering the lane, and weakened between horses. TOP NOTE lacked speed in the four path, came into the lane in the seven path, and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Beemster
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, 3wd btwn 1/4, rallied, late bid, drifted out, up

ENTRY.NAME: Gallant Buck
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, drew off 1/4, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Bello Creedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2wd, yielded 1/4, wknd btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Top Note
ENTRY.OWNER: Hoffman Farms Racing LLC and Alexis Claire Racing Services LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, 7p upper, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Back Beat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd, coaxed turn, 4wd 1/4, changed leads 1/8, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Special Operator
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, saved ground, rail rally, place bid 1/8, flattened out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 7 1 1/8M Turf CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $50,000 In Their Last 3 Starts). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One M ile and One Eighth.) (Rail at 34 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYREDWHITEANDBLUE tracked along the inside, shifted outside of a rival nearing the far turn, fanned five wide entering the lane while ranging up, bid at the three sixteenths pole along with an inner DESERT DUKE, dueled with that foe through the final furlong, and narrowly prevailed. DESERT DUKE stalked along the inside, tipped outside of the top trio entering the lane to bid along with an outer rival in upper stretch, led from that foe entering the final furlong, sparred gamely while clinging to a margin in the late stages, but was caught at the wire. DECCAN PRINCE (IRE) tracked two to three wide, bid around the far turn, led entering the lane, but was outkicked by a pair of outer rivals in upper stretch, and chased them home. FUJIN pressed two wide, vied between horses around the far turn, but failed to keep pace with his outer counterpart and a pair of outer bidders entering the lane, and gave way. SIMPLY WOW laid off of the pace in the three path, came into the lane in the six path, and made little impact. CAFE RACER set the pace along the inside, but was headed by a pair of bidders around the far turn, and weakened in upper stretch. FOE was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Cafe Racer
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, headed ins pair 5/16, wknd upper

ENTRY.NAME: Myredwhiteandblue
ENTRY.OWNER: Powell Bennett E and Roussel III Louie J
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, 2w2nd, 5w1/4, rallied, bid 3/16, dueled, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Deccan Prince (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2-3wd, bid 5/16, brief lead 1/4, outkicked upper, chased

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Duke
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked ins, 2p2nd, 4wd btwn 1/4, bid 3/16, led, dueled, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Foe
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Fujin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd, vied btwn 2nd, outkicked 1/4, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Simply Wow
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p, 6p1/4, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 6, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Wher e Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROMANTIC BEAST stalked along the inside, shifted to the three path while closing in on the clear leader at the quarter pole, drew clear at the furlong grounds, and held off an outer bidder late. IZEONPOINT trailed along the inside, moved out of last two wide and between horses around the far turn, rallied three wide through midstretch, took aim on the clear leader in the final sixteenth, offered a late bid, but was denied. GLANCE tracked two wide, tucked to the rail down the backstretch, saved ground around the far turn, chased to bid for place two wide and between horses at the furlong grounds, gained that position soon after, but was outkicked in the final sixteenth while flattening out. QUINN MURPHY raced far back in the four path, fanned six wide in upper stretch, and moved up. FASHION MERIT stalked in the three path, chased in the four path leaving the quarter pole, but yielded among foes at the furlong grounds. SUFFRAGETTE laid off of the pace in the two path, retreated to trail into the far turn, drifted out to the center of the track in upper stretch, and never got involved. QUEEN'S MISSION opened up to a wide margin, maintained a clear advantage entering the lane, but was caught nearing the furlong pole, and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Suffragette
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2p, trailed 2nd, drifted out 11p upr, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Queen's Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: sped clear, opened up, caught 1/8, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked ins, 3p1/4, bid upr, cleared 1/8, dug in late, held

ENTRY.NAME: Glance
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2wd,ins 5/8,place bid 2wd btw1/8,outkicked late,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Izeonpoint
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed ins, 2wd btw2nd, 3wd upper, rallied, late bid, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Quinn Murphy
ENTRY.OWNER: Day Perry and Foster Joseph M
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back 4p, 6wd upper, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Fashion Merit
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2wd-3p, 4p1/4, chased, yielded btwn 1/8
